ConversationAction.text: There's no way I'm coming out of here until those husks and jove forsaken cultists are dead!
They're all dead? Here, let me get the door.
I knew we should have kicked those cultists out the airlock the second they came on board, here's something for your trouble.
Hey, you look like a submariner. I've got some colleagues researching the abyss I've been trying to contact. Could you pay them a vist to see if they need anything?
Here, I'll give you the coordinates.

Option.text: Do I look like an erran boy?

ConversationAction.text: Your type are usually all too happy to do tasks. Maybe at the next outpost I'll be able to find some real help.

An ad catches your eye, 'Europa got you down? The depths not treating you well? Looking for some jovial fun? Come relax and catch a show! We're always open.'. There's coordinates to a clown theatre attached.
Oh hello! You must be here for the show!
Oh, surely you've heard about it! The famous clown Pagliacci is here to give the preformance of a life time! Free for all to see, as is his wish.
Perfect! Head down to the theatre and get ready for a show!

Option.text: I've got no time for clowns.

ConversationAction.text: Such a shame, everyone should take time to enjoy themselves, even you!
And now, please give a warm welcome to Pagliacci!
Hello, hello everyone! Thank you for such a warm welcome! I remind audience members to keep well away from me while I preform!
And now, without further delay... My preformance of a life time!
You look like a jovial fella, I've got some other jovial friends you could help out, if you're interested. I'll mark it on your map.

You can hear a conversation on the other side of the door.
'Are you sure we should be messing around with this thing?'.
'The institute wouldn't have given it to us if they didn't want it messed with.'
'You heard that sound too, right? Where are the researchers?'

'Ah shit, this is the second time this month.' The guard sizes you up. 'You're a submariner, right? I had the new batch of researchers equipped with tracking beacons in case it happened again. Would you be willing to recover whatever's left of them?'
'Perfect! Here, I'll activate the beacons.' 'Once you find them, grab anything that looks, uh, alieny. And brind it back here. I'll be sure to make it worth your time.'
'Oh well, it never hurts to ask.' 'The institude is going to be pissed to hear we lost more researchers...'
'Did you find whatever they were messing with?'
Where did we put that alien object again?
'Ah, perfect! I'll store this somewhere safe. Oh, and your reward! The researchers have got some trinkets here if you want them or I could give you some marks.'
Welcome to our humble church traveler. Say, you look like the type that would help the church. We've got some acolytes on a nearby outpost looking for transport. Here, I'll mark it down for you.
